main event: A civilian reported sighting a luminous gray aircraft-like object in New Orleans on July 17, 1949.
interesting points: The object was larger than a small airplane and traveled faster than normal aircraft,The object disappeared behind a building after being observed for 30 seconds to 5 minutes,The observer was a civilian housewife, Mrs. [redacted], aged 65, who described the object as having finger-like projections from each end.,A second sighting occurred on July 18, 1949, by Mrs. [redacted] in Moreauville, who saw a golden object moving slowly from east to west., There were no sounds or odors associated with either sighting.
witness description: Mrs. [redacted], a housewife, and her son, an assistant manager at a local electric company.
